roleset.name: removal/loss of hair

example.name: epilate-v
example.text: Cotton thread is twisted between the hands and fingers *PRO* to epilate the hair from the follicle.

example.name: epilation-n
example.text: I did discuss with this patient possible toxicities associated with cranial irradiation including skin erythema and permanent epilation and alopecia as well as alterations from cognitive baseline secondary to inflammation and edema from radiation therapy .

roleset.note: EPILATE-V, EPILATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.
